void mainImage( out vec4 O, vec2 u )
{   vec2  R = iResolution.xy,
          U = u / R;                                    // normalized coordinates
    float z = texture( iChannel0, U ).w;                // scene depth
        O = textureLod(iChannel0, 
                       U,
                       -6.+log2(length(R)*abs(z-1.6)) ); // log2( circle of confusion ) 
  O = pow(O,vec4(1./2.2)); // linearize output
}
